typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		DISTANCE as short,
		late_flight as boolean,
		depart_time as timestamp,
		arrival_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/5K/*']) ~> parquet5K
source(output(
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		DISTANCE as short,
		late_flight as boolean,
		depart_time as timestamp,
		arrival_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/50K/*']) ~> parquet50K
source(output(
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		DISTANCE as short,
		late_flight as boolean,
		depart_time as timestamp,
		arrival_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/500K/*']) ~> parquet500K
source(output(
		DAY_OF_WEEK as short,
		AIRLINE as string,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER as short,
		TAIL_NUMBER as string,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT as string,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT as string,
		DISTANCE as short,
		late_flight as boolean,
		depart_time as timestamp,
		arrival_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['parquet/5M/*']) ~> parquet5M
parquet5K derive(FLIGHT_NUMBER = toInteger(FLIGHT_NUMBER),
		DAY_OF_WEEK = toInteger(DAY_OF_WEEK),
		DISTANCE = toInteger(DISTANCE)) ~> typeCast
parquet50K derive(FLIGHT_NUMBER = toInteger(FLIGHT_NUMBER),
		DAY_OF_WEEK = toInteger(DAY_OF_WEEK),
		DISTANCE = toInteger(DISTANCE)) ~> typeCast50K
parquet500K derive(FLIGHT_NUMBER = toInteger(FLIGHT_NUMBER),
		DAY_OF_WEEK = toInteger(DAY_OF_WEEK),
		DISTANCE = toInteger(DISTANCE)) ~> typeCast500K
parquet5M derive(FLIGHT_NUMBER = toInteger(FLIGHT_NUMBER),
		DAY_OF_WEEK = toInteger(DAY_OF_WEEK),
		DISTANCE = toInteger(DISTANCE)) ~> typeCast5M
typeCast sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['flights5K.avro'],
	mapColumn(
		DAY_OF_WEEK,
		AIRLINE,
		FLIGHT_NUMBER,
		TAIL_NUMBER,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT,
		DESTINATION_AIRPORT,
		DISTANCE,
		late_flight,
		depart_time,
		arrival_time
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeAVRO5K
typeCast50K sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['flights50K.avro'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeAVRO50K
typeCast500K sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['flights500K.avro'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeAVRO500K
typeCast5M sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['flights5M.avro'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeAVRO5M
